title: Riot have you thought of doing this?
body: Hey I was wondering since like people purchase RP I was wondering like if some put more than a $100 or more would people get something for that, like a skin, ward skin or at least a summoner icon for spending money onto lol???

replies.body: At this point in time, I'm up over $3000 spent in game haha. Would of been nice to have something like that. Or even a special skin or something when you get to a certain number of skins.
